TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Because flying to your doom is very 3D.

Why not just forget about Gravity?

It's a terrible Boring movie with a plot that makes you sleep for the rest of the film. Eventually forgetting whatever you saw a few hours ago.
"What if" is what if not?

The syntax of your "question" indicates that you are making more of a statement and less of asking a question. Which means the question is invalid, and therfore unanswerable.

If Jack Sprat could eat no fat, and his wife could eat no lean, then why didn't they just swap plates?

They did.

When does "what goes down" come up?

When what is old becomes new again.

What does the fox say?

Uhf uhf uhf.

If pi is 3.14, what is my ip?

Your IP is where to find you to ask some very personal questions.

When the IP pool gets empty, will the Universe collapse?

The Urineverse will. (You will notice thar there is no P in our _ool, please keep it that way   )

Will Aunty Jack be back?

Yes, very aunty, the auntiest one.

Why does aunty have two ankles but one uncle?

Because she is an oncologist.

Where have all the flowers gone?

They've flown.

If flowers flow, is tree what's tred?

No, it would be tread.

When considering the spelling of words in the English language, why is it "comb" and not "gcome" when it's "gnome" and not "nomb"?

You should first update your PyGNOME and Gnomba setups to request the answer.

Why is there no PyGNOMba?

Because of the PyGNOMban.

When do birds suddenly appear?

When something heavy from above hits Tom's head.

As there is a Tommy-gun, what's used by Jerry?

Anything Jerry rigged.

Where is Boo Boo in Fallout 3?

Went to school.

Spoiler


Why is Fallout 3 so green?

Because you didn't use the option to turn it blue or red.

Can I get a Fallout New Sydney?

I dunno, did Australia get nuked in Fallout?

Can I get parts of my memory wiped to remove any memory of cringe things i have done when i was younger?

Yes. They even can return you to the state of an innocent toddler.

7 minutes ago, BA-Forums said:

I dunno, did Australia get nuked in Fallout?

What Australia? Had anyone heard about Australia in Fallout?

 

As the Dog is immortal, can we just start attaching the Fatman nukes to it, sending it forward, then reusing the resurrected Dog?

The dog might be immortal meaning it doesn't die but it good get into such a good lucid dream every time that it is unresponsive for 100,000 years.

If the Earth is round how come rulers don't need to bend?

 

Edited April 15 by idkgeek

Because, technically, the Earth is ovoid and not perfectly round due to gravity and rotation.

If the Earth is ovoid, does this mean that we are all just products of an egg?

No, because the Earth is actually more of a Pear shape.

Is there an apple on the other side of the Sun?

No, because we cannot see the other side. 

will the next question start with ¨As an AI language model?¨

As an AI language model? Definitely.

Why did Tattooine have two suns?
